name: SkeletonView
description: Allows showing a temporary skeleton view while your real view is loading

props.name: showContent
props.description: The content has been loaded, start fading out the skeleton and fading in the content

props.name: renderContent
props.description: A function that will render the content once the content is ready (i.e. showContent is true). The method will be called with the Skeleton's customValue (i.e. renderContent(props?.customValue))

props.name: customValue
props.description: Custom value of any type to pass on to SkeletonView and receive back in the renderContent callback.

props.name: template
props.description: The type of the skeleton view.

props.name: listProps
props.description: Props that are available when using template={SkeletonView.templates.LIST_ITEM}

props.name: timesKey
props.description: A key prefix for the duplicated SkeletonViews

props.name: height
props.description: The height of the skeleton view

props.name: width
props.description: The width of the skeleton view

props.name: colors
props.description: The colors of the skeleton view, the array length has to be >=2

props.name: borderRadius
props.description: The border radius of the skeleton view

props.name: circle
props.description: Whether the skeleton is a circle (will override the borderRadius)

props.name: shimmerStyle
props.description: Additional style to the skeleton view
